title: Black and Blue: The Psychologies and Realities of American Criminal Justice

media:group.media:title: Black and Blue: The Psychologies and Realities of American Criminal Justice
media:group.media:description:
Is the criminal justice system systemically discriminatory? Let's look at the data, how Americans perceive said system, and how those perceptions might affect recent court cases.
